name: Crossroads Inn

game.exe: drive_c/Games/The Lord of the Rings The Battle for Middle-Earth Collection/TLotR The Battle for Middle-Earth/lotrbfme.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/The Lord of the Rings The Battle for Middle-Earth Collection/TLotR
    The Battle for Middle-Earth/lotrbfme.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Crossroads Inn
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  terminal: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
